TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerVisual extends System.Windows.Media.Visual

summary.span: 管理 对象的集合。

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作对象集合的容器 。The class is used as a container for a collection of objects. 类派生自 类，因此 类也可以包含视觉对象的集合。The class derives from the class, such that the class can also contain a collection of visual objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 对象，该对象用作两个对象的父级 。The following example shows how to create a object that is used as the parent for two objects. 添加到对象中的对象 必须按 (底部到顶部) 的反向 z 顺序添加，以确保它们按正确的绘制顺序呈现。Objects that are added to the object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order. 为了正确枚举可视化树，该示例提供方法和属性的重写实现 。In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the method and property. [!code-csharp[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#containervisualhost01)] [!code-vb[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#containervisualhost01)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filterCallback`参数可以为 null，在这种情况下，它将被忽略。The `filterCallback` parameter can be null, in which case, it is ignored. 如果不 `filterCallback` 为 `null` ，则在之前调用它 `resultCallback` 。If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的不透明度（基于 0=透明，1=不透明）。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the , based on 0=transparent, 1=opaque.

value.span: 一个介于 0 到 1 之间的值，它指定从完全透明到完全不透明之间的一个范围。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.

value.span: 如果值为 0，则指示 完全透明；如果值为 1，则指示 完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the is completely opaque.

value.span: 值 0.5 指示不透明度为 50%，值 0.725 指示不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

span.span: A value 0.5 indicates 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ XSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };
member this.XSnappingGuidelines : System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection with get, set

summary.span: 为 获取或设置 X（水平）准线。

span.span: Gets or sets the X (horizontal) guideline for the .
The horizontal guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素对齐是内容布局固定到的过程，以便在特定于设备的像素上呈现对象边缘。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. WPF 图形系统使用与设备无关的单位来实现分辨率和设备独立性。The WPF graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素会按系统的每英寸点数自动缩放 (dpi) 设置。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's dots per inch (dpi) setting. 这为 WPF 应用程序提供了针对不同 dpi 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序能够自动识别 dpi。This provides WPF applications proper scaling for different dpi settings and makes the application automatically dpi-aware. 但是，这种 dpi 独立性可能会因为抗锯齿而产生不规则边缘渲染。However, this dpi independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 当边缘的位置落在设备像素中间而不是设备像素之间时，可能会出现这些项目（通常看起来是模糊或 "软" 边缘）。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 为了解决此问题，WPF 提供了一种方法，使可视化树中的对象边缘通过像素对齐方式 "对齐" 到设备像素，从而消除抗锯齿产生的软边缘。To address this issue, WPF provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ YSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };
member this.YSnappingGuidelines : System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection with get, set

summary.span: 为 获取或设置 Y（垂直）准线。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y (vertical) guideline for the .
The vertical guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素对齐是内容布局固定到的过程，以便在特定于设备的像素上呈现对象边缘。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. WPF 图形系统使用与设备无关的单位来实现分辨率和设备独立性。The WPF graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每个与设备无关的像素会按系统的每英寸点数自动缩放 (dpi) 设置。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's dots per inch (dpi) setting. 这为 WPF 应用程序提供了针对不同 dpi 设置的适当缩放，并使应用程序能够自动识别 dpi。This provides WPF applications proper scaling for different dpi settings and makes the application automatically dpi-aware. 但是，这种 dpi 独立性可能会因为抗锯齿而产生不规则边缘渲染。However, this dpi independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 当边缘的位置落在设备像素中间而不是设备像素之间时，可能会出现这些项目（通常看起来是模糊或 "软" 边缘）。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 为了解决此问题，WPF 提供了一种方法，使可视化树中的对象边缘通过像素对齐方式 "对齐" 到设备像素，从而消除抗锯齿产生的软边缘。To address this issue, WPF provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
